attributes.action: Tell us when you will order the HMRC tax avoidance team into the House of Commons?
attributes.additional_details: The 650 or so dishonourable electeds pay CONSIDERABLY less taxes than the 650 standard rate taxpayers who live nearest to the House of Commons.  This is a situation which cannot be allowed to obtain.  Dishonourable electeds MUST be obliged to live in the same world as standard rate taxpayers and that means suffering the consequences of the appalling and disingenuous fiscal and monetary decisions currently being forced upon the rest of us in the name of party politicking to keep David Cameron in Number 10.
